skills.name: SpringBoot
skills.desc: I have extensive experience with Spring Boot, building scalable and maintainable backend services. My expertise includes developing RESTful APIs, integrating with various databases, and ensuring high performance and security in applications.

skills.name: Frontend
skills.desc: I specialize in ReactJS to create dynamic and responsive user interfaces. My projects emphasize user experience, accessibility, and performance, delivering visually appealing and intuitive web applications.

skills.name: Android
skills.desc: I have a strong background in Android development, creating native applications that are both user-friendly and feature-rich. My skills include designing interfaces, managing databases, and integrating APIs to enhance functionality.

skills.name: PHP
skills.desc: With PHP, I develop dynamic and interactive websites, ranging from e-commerce platforms to content management systems. My proficiency in PHP ensures robust backend functionality and seamless user experiences.

skills.name: Database
skills.desc: I am well-versed in database management, particularly with MySQL and PostgreSQL. My expertise includes designing efficient database schemas, optimizing queries, and ensuring data integrity and security in all my projects.
